features: RESTORE MOISTURE - Infuse your skin with our hydrating face cream. Hydrating Green tea & fig extracts along with Super antioxidants Acai & Goji Berry help restore moisture and prevent dryness

DEEP HYDRATION - Our face cream is in enriched with Vitamin E, Jojoba, Green Tea & Fig extract. Super-antioxidants Acai and Goji Berry infuse your skin with intense nourishment, leaving a smooth and hydrating glow on your skin

HYPOALLERGENIC MOISTURIZER - GIOVANNI D:TOX system Replenishing Facial Moisturizer is hypoallergenic and clinically tested. This pH-balanced moisturizer will leave your skin feeling refreshed & nourished

VEGAN-FRIENDLY & CRUELTY-FREE - GIOVANNI Products use a number of organic ingredients and are Leaping Bunny Certified cruelty free. GIOVANNI Products are never tested on animals and come in sophisticated recyclable packaging
ECO CHIC - GIOVANNI has been bridging the gap between natural and salon-quality hair care since 1979. We strive to use the very best ingredients and are always focused on high performance
body.description: GIOVANNI D:tox System Replenishing Facial Moisturizer contains Super-antioxidants Acai & Goji Berry in combination with Activated Charcoal & Volcanic Ash to restore moisture and help prevent dryness. GIOVANNI was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural product stores, and today is the #1 selling Hair Care line in the United States Natural Products Industry. But before there was a brand, there was a pioneer. Arthur Guidotti had a vision and a love for all things hair. He began developing his passion as a hairstylist in Hollywood and Beverly Hills. By the 1960s, Arthur was maturing his talents and decided to open his own salon, called On Sunset. The salon was a bustling site, on the famous Sunset Strip, and a hit with many Hollywood celebrities, including Lucille Ball. Since 1979 the GIOVANNI Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance. GIOVANNI is committed to creating only the highest-performance formulations, wrapped in aesthetically beautiful packaging and marketed with extraordinary visuals and graphics.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: D:TOX SYSTEM for Face and Body Invigorating Skin Care Giovanni’s D:TOX facial and body care products are filled with unique blends of powerful Activated Charcoal and Volcanic Ash. Hand-harvested Acai and Goji Berries, leave a smooth glow for a beautiful complexion. Botanical Extracts Antioxidant-filled extracts of Green Tea, Fig, Acai, and Goji Berry help restore your skin's elasticity and youthful-looking glow with ultimate hydration. Refreshed Appearance Deep within skin, debris and toxins reside, clouding your skin’s natural radiance. Extract impurities while rejuvenating skin. Perfect for adults and teenagers. Cruelty-Free D:TOX products are Lauryl and Laureth Sulfate-free. We don’t add harsh chemicals, or artificial dyes, and never test on animals!

Nutrient Rich Ingredients List of Botanical Extracts: Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Volcanic Ash, Charcoal Powder (Activated), Iron Oxides (Magnetite), Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Valencia Orange) Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, *Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice *USDA Certified Organic Ingredient. (Awarded in 2020) For a complete list of ingredients please reference the ingredients label on the back of the product. Hypoallergenic Dermatologist tested Clinically tested D:TOX SYSTEM Replenishing Facial Moisturizer Recommended as a day or night moisturizer for all skin types to moisturize and help prevent dryness. Infuse your skin in hydration with this lightweight formula enhanced with powerful Green Tea and Fig extracts for supple and healthier-looking skin. Super-antioxidants Acai and Goji Berry refresh skin with nourishment, leaving your face feeling smooth, soft and beautifully glowing with radiance. pH balanced and it won’t clog your pores. Powerful Green Tea & Fig infuse skin in hydration to restore moisture and help prevent dryness Removes pollutants & impurities Super-antioxidants Acai and Goji Berry refresh your skin with nourishment

Giovanni...Bridging the Gap Between Natural & Salon Quality OUR INGREDIENTS Our products are formulated using a number of organic ingredients, we are Leaping Bunny Certified and the vast majority of our products are vegan friendly. OUR COMMUNITY Giovanni enjoys partnering with Eco Chic women (& men) who use their everyday gifts to do something beautiful in our world and local communities. OUR STORY Giovanni was the first full-range, salon-inspired hair-care brand in natural products stores, and today continues to Bridge the Gap between Natural and Salon-Quality hair care. OUR COMMITMENT Since 1979 the Giovanni Rule of Balance has been our commitment to make each product as pure and as natural as possible without sacrificing exceptional product performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing, gentle cleansing for many types of skin!
reviews.reviewText: I am posting my full review of this system to each product I purchased! See below, and I hope you find this review helpful!I read a ton of reviews in searching for a new line of facial cleansing products, and settled on this as my newest attempt. I have a rather infuriating combination of skin on my face. I get large, deep bumps that tend not to come to a head on my chin (but only one or two here and there) and forehead (randomly), while also having smaller, reddish or white heads on my forehead. I have blackheads on my nose, and then recently have started waking up to small white bumps on either side of my nose. The bumps on my cheeks just beside my nose is also accompanied by a redness a lot of the time to that area of the skin. I have ruled out rosacea with my doctor. My skin is also relatively sensitive to moisturizers, and often to exfoliating scrubs, which can be annoying since my forehead also gets dry and sometimes flaky. So there's what I was dealing with.I bought the D:tox Purifying Facial Cleanser, the Purifying Facial Scrub, the System Replenishing Facial Moisturizer, and the Purifying Facial Mask. I have now been using the system for just over three weeks, and here is what I think:Cleanser: I absolutely love it. It's not overly scented, though it does smell pleasant, it's mostly a clean smell. It's a thick liquid, but not too thick. I note that it doesn't stick to the bottle too much, and doesn't leave any sort of residue on it as I deplete the bottle, which I think is noteworthy. The empty plastic at the top of the bottle is crystal clear. It doesn't foam a lot, but it doesn't need to. After washing my face with this (I was twice daily, in the morning and at night) my skin feels calm, the redness is reduced visibly, and my skin doesn't get inflamed. I really love using this wash. I really love that there are no harsh chemicals like salicylic acid and it still is clearing up my acne without attacking the other parts of my skin. I think this cleanser, while solving my acne problems, would also be a wonderful daily wash for folks that do not have acne. It's clean and fresh and gentle.Scrub: For the first 2.5 weeks, I used this every time I washed my face. I am actually quite impressed with it. This isn't like some products that have the visible microbeads, it's almost like a fine, smooth sand is mixed in with an opaque cream. It doesn't really have much of a scent to it. Like the cleanser, it smells clean. I mentioned my skin has issues with scrubs sometimes. In past attempts at using other skin care systems, I will often reduce the number of times I use a scrub even more significantly than they will suggest, because it will irritate my skin if used to frequently. I don't like removing scrubs entirely, however, because the exfoliation leaves my skin looking brighter, and pulls that dead skin that causes grossness from certain areas. This scrub is so gentle. I very gently scrub in circular motions all over my face and the results are obvious. My skin feels softer, and I have no more flaking at all ever! This is also the work of the moisturizer, but I'll get to that in a moment. I have in the last week, started to experiment with only using this every other day, and will update my review after I've done this for a bit longer.Moisturizer: I have to tell you, regardless of the system, I have gone through so. many. moisturizers. I have tried vegan ones, unscented ones, oil free ones, combo skin, and on and one. I struggle most with this because of the range of need on my face. My forehead is oily, but the skin also gets dry and flaky sometimes. My nose is constantly oily, and my cheeks and chin tend to be pretty normal. I've used moisturizer combinations on different parts of my face and just nothing has ever been quite as great as this stuff. I mean, I'm in love with the moisturizer. I use a good almost nickel sized bit and rub it in my hands and all over my face and neck. It was off-putting to me at first, because it seemed a tad on the greasy side when I got it applied, however, after thoroughly massaging it in, after a few minutes it absorbs and doesn't feel heavy at all. It's creamy and luxurious and the difference it has made to evening my skin has been completely awesome. I no longer get dry flakiness, and my nose is getting the proper level of moisture so it's not overly producing oil anymore. I cannot say enough good things about this stuff!Mask: I use the mask 2-3 times per week. I apply a thin layer all over my face while dry and then leave it for 20 minutes while I fold clothes and watch Netflix. I usually use it after the scrub, but before moisturizing. It drys completely but doesn't flake off. It's a thick cream and, like the other products, is lightly scented but only to smell clean and earthy. After rinsing, my skin feels like it's had oil and impurities sucked out of it, without overly drying out my face. It's especially satisfying to apply the moisturizer after the mask.Summary: This is an excellent system for mild to moderate acne, but my opinion is that this is also a great product for those looking for a cleaning system or product without acne. Depending on your needs, just parts of the system will work for you. It's a great product for sensitive skin, and incredibly affordable compared to other systems. I recommend this highly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I live by this
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using it for a number of years. I have consistently had breakouts like when I was a teenager. Then I had a car accident with an airbag deployed that had a recall.. the chalky powder and canvas burned my chin and neck and I’ve always broken out very easily in those areas since then. The lotion and face mask have done a lot of good for my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just right,Not too heavy & makes my face feel good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect facial moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Love this stuff. Was originally given to me as a gift, and it took me awhile to put it to use because I didn't expect it to be much different from other creams, BUT IT IS! For me, this product is moisturizing perfection. It moisturizes to the right level and never makes my skin feel greasy. It sinks right in and leaves my face soft and supple. This tube will last you a long, long time, and the price is right! I've also recently purchased the D:tox Facial Scrub and am enjoying that a lot as well.

absolutely love this facial lotion! I usually use Cetaphil restoraderm day and night but Cetaphil's lotion is better for overnight use as it is heavier and a bit greasier, this Giovanni facial lotion however is SUPER light weight, once you massage it in and it absorbs, it's dry to the touch and doesn't feel greasy at all and still moisturizes my skin throughout the day!I use this now as my daytime moisturizer as it's more lightweight than Cetaphil, I use Cetaphil for overnight.love the smell, no artificial fragrance which is awesome, and love the ingredients, all natural and still effective!I haven't had any adverse reactions to this and I've been using it for over a month now.definitely will buy again[edit]forgot to mention, as with many of Giovanni's products, a little goes a long way, I use less than a pea sized amount and I can cover 2/3 of my face, I've been using the first tube for 5 weeks now and the tube is still practically full as new!

reviews.reviewTitle: Crème hydratante efficace sans parfum, bourrée d'antioxydants
reviews.reviewText: Je précise de suite que je suis un homme.La composition de la crème est très simple, donc avec peu de produits chimiques. Mais elle a tous les extraits de plantes antioxydantes qui promettent l'efficacité sur le long terme. Cela fait 3 ans que je n'achète que ça et elle semble faire son effet. Tout d'abord, c'est une crème hydratante avec une bonne texture qui pénètre rapidement. Après, pour l'aspect antiride, antiâge et tout le blabla marketing, je vous dirais qu'elle ne fait pas de mal et qu'il est possible qu'elle ait un éventuel effet. Mais l'aspect hydratant fonctionne très bien.Quand on a une ride, il est trop tard, le rôle de la crème est d’éviter l'apparition des autres ridules. Donc, il faut s'y prendre tôt, en prévention. La crème est vite absorbée par la peau, elle laisse un film très léger qui s'efface très vite en frottant après 5 minutes. Elle gonfle la ridule et semble éviter l'apparition d'autres rides (en tout cas, elle semble ralentir le processus sur ma peau), c'est le premier rôle d'une bonne crème hydratante.Enfin, elle n'a aucun parfum, et ça, c'est important pour moi. Son prix est excellent au regard de la grande quantité. Bref, c'est un bon plan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 5, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: Best moisturiser I've ever used and excellent value for money
reviews.reviewText: Best moisturiser I've ever used and excellent value for money. Only need a tiny amount and last one lasted nearly 6 months with using once a day.
I love this cream! it is truly moisturizing without grease or any residue, or nasty chemical smells. My regular store did not have any, so I was very happy to have found it on Amazon.
